title: Stuck on Reconnect
body:
So earlier today (26.09.17), I was playing a norms game with a friend (CatGod). After we had finished, we tried to make a new game but it said that "something went wrong, please try again". Obviously, we both logged out and logged back in yet when we got back to league, it dragged us into a "game" (of which we did not create). So now, not being able to quit ingame, we are both stuck on the "reconnect page" and a false summoners rift. Has this happened to anyone else?

If any Riot employees see this, please fix this bug(?) as both CatGod and myself are stuck on the reconnect page.

replies.body: Yep same stuck on reconnect also after finishing a normal relogged client and stuck in game >.<
that makes 7 of us now lol

> [{quoted}](name=HomelessJhin,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=adA3xees,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-26T00:08:37.284+0000)
>
> that makes 7 of us now lol

feelsbad
